name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
A man in Hunan Province hacked and killed six people, including the elderly and children, after getting divorced. He was recently taken to the execution ground to be executed.
According to the notice of Changde Intermediate People's Court in Hunan Province, Wang Zhaojun divorced Zhang Meiyun in 2021. After killing Zhang Meiyun in the same year, Wang Zhaojun thought of the conflicts with Hu Dacheng and Yang Xianjun, so he hacked Hu Dacheng and his old mother to death. Then he went to Yang Xianjun's home and killed his 8-year-old daughter, 10-year-old son, and 46-year-old father. https://pbs.twimg.com/media/Gi9JVDwbcAAO10q.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, in Yuyao, Zhejiang, a student from Yuyao Shinan Middle School reported that the director of the political education department searched students' schoolbags for contraband during lunch break, and his chili sauce and pickled cabbage were thrown away by the director, so he was so angry that he confronted the director and was dragged by the director. Previously, a student had his 1,000 yuan card confiscated. After posting the video online, he and his father were talked to by the vice principal and asked to delete the video. https://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1886818920604274688/pu/img/MivviL6WDAPNefEP.jpg
